actions.committee: Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Aging (Labor and Human Resources).

official_title: A bill to amend the Older Americans Act of 1965 to increase efforts to inform isolated older individuals, and older individuals who are victims of Alzheimer's disease and related disorders, of the availability of assistance under title III of such Act.
short_title: Outreach, Information, and Referral Older Americans Amendments of 1991

summary.text: Outreach, Information, and Referral Older Americans Amendments of 1991 - Amends the Older Americans Act of 1965 to require outreach and referral programs under the Act to emphasize linking available services to older individuals who are isolated and who are victims of Alzheimer's disease and to their caregivers.

titles.title: Outreach, Information, and Referral Older Americans Amendments of 1991

A bill to amend the Older Americans Act of 1965 to increase efforts to inform isolated older individuals, and older individuals who are victims of Alzheimer's disease and related disorders, of the availability of assistance under title III of such Act.
